I admit that I legit have a hard time believing that anyone could possibly hate stuff like One-punch man, One Piece (4kids dub aside), And Gunbuster.[/bq]
Dude; weabs are only a couple ten million people on the planet (at most a hundred million) chances are pretty high that there's lots of people that know what they are, have watched it and hate all of them.

That would be like going "I legit have a hard time believing that anyone could possibly hate football"; a lot of people hate football.
